title: Uber’s Revenue Is Up 72 Percent From Last Year, but It Posts a Loss
description: The company had strong revenue growth but lost money in part because of its investments in other ride-hailing businesses.
dc:creator: Kalley Huang
media:description: “Even as the macroeconomic environment remains uncertain, Uber’s core business is stronger than ever,” Dara Khosrowshahi, Uber’s chief executive, said in a statement.
